rows.label: qev040901_MSG0001
rows.name: Ah! Muimui has been looking everywhere for friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0002
rows.name:
Muimui used Legen-dar to keep searching for signal,
and finally found one way up north in Sylvalum.
This time it HAS to be Sword of Legendaryness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0003
rows.name:
So friend must put Muimui in knapsack and carry him
to Sylvalum. Now...MUSH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_JNK0010
rows.name: Shake Head

rows.label: qev040901_SEL0011
rows.name: Suggest that Muimui should walk there himself.

rows.label: qev040901_JNK0020
rows.name: Sigh

rows.label: qev040901_SEL0021
rows.name: Show your disgust at Muimui's epic laziness.

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0004
rows.name: Body of Muimui in tatters after all the questing lately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0005
rows.name:
But even so, Muimui refuse to give up until sword
is found![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0006
rows.name:
Muimui plan to conserve energy on way there so he
can go wild once destination is reached.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0007
rows.name:
Muimui hoped that noble intention would be apparent
to friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0008
rows.name:
Friend only has to carry Muimui to Seabird's Beak
at entrance to Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0009
rows.name:
After that, Muimui handle everything himself.
Now hurry and stuff Muimui into warm, cozy bag![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0010
rows.name:
Be careful out there, Brotherpon! Moimoi will be here
holding down fort until return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0011
rows.name:
So long! Now let quest for Sword of Legendaryness
start for real this time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0012
rows.name:
Onward and away, friend! And know that brave
Muimui will have back every step of the way.
Or at least will be hanging from back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0013
rows.name:
Go ahead and hand over Sword of Legendaryness
to that guy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0014
rows.name:
Muimui and friend will collect huge paycheck,
then head back to throw giant party with Moimoi![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0015
rows.name: Huh? Walter is gone? Is he off on some other job?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0016
rows.name:
Muimui finally find Sword of Legendaryness,
and he can't get paid for it?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040901_MSG0017
rows.name: Meh-meh! This is the WORST! Come back already![ST:wait ]
